name: Power of Love (itch)
description:
Power of Love is the prototype for a co-op dungeon crawler by small game developer Rat King! Shoot, slice, smash and stomp your way through the hell called relationship! But don't worry, with the help of your friend / partner / spirit animal and the magic that is "communication" you can survive together!

Buy the juicy soundtrack of Power of Love by KingLudi (three songs + one bonus song) and you will also get the fully playable prototype for fun local co-op action!

Attention: the game was not tested with Mac and Linux, try at own risk!
